description:
Swiss Miss hot cocoa is the smooth, creamy way to indulge your chocolate craving. Just add hot water.
Conventional Preparation: Empty contents of envelope into a cup. Gradually stir 6 oz (3/4 cup) hot (not boiling) water into mix. Microwave Preparation: Empty contents of envelope into a cup. In a separate microwave-safe container, heat 6 oz (3/4 cup) water on High about 1-1/2 minutes or until hot, but not boiling. Gradually stir hot water into mix. For best results: Do not use boiling water. For more indulgent cocoa, make with milk instead of water and/or top with whipped cream.
title: Swiss Miss Classics Milk Chocolate Hot Cocoa Mix - 10ct

description: Swiss Miss is a cocoa of superior quality. A cocoa that you'll feel great about sharing with family and friends. description:
Less packaging same number of servings. A good source of 12 vitamins & minerals. No artificial flavors or sweeteners. 99.9% caffeine free. Good food, good life. Good Questions: How can Rich Chocolate Ovaltine taste great and be good for you? Good to Know: Well, it has 12 vitamins and minerals, no artificial flavors, and delivers a rich, creamy taste! Good to Remember: Rich Chocolate Ovaltine also makes a great addition to smoothies, baked goods or sprinkled over ice cream for a chocolatey dessert!

Directions
Close lid tightly. Store in a cool, dry place. Enjoy Ovaltine. Cold: Add 2 tbsp Ovaltine mix to 8 oz cold milk. Stir well. Hot: Place 2 tbsp Ovaltine in mug. Add 8 oz hot milk. Stir well. Microwave: Heat 8 oz milk in microwave-safe mug for 1-1/2 minutes or until warm (avoid overheating milk). Add 2 tbsp Ovaltine. Stir well.
title: Ovaltine Rich Chocolate Mix 12 oz

description:
Makes 39 servings. Made with real Nestle cocoa. The pond finally froze - we skated until dark. Nobody forgets those days. Nestle Hot Cocoa makes the moment even better. Over 100 years of making chocolatey memories. Good to know: delicious Nestle Rich Milk Chocolate Hot Cocoa contains natural antioxidants (75 mg per serving) and is an excellent source of calcium. Good to remember: antioxidants help to protect cells from damage and calcium helps to build strong bones. 99.9% caffeine free. Nutrition facts are per 8 fl oz hot cocoa, as required by FDA regulations. Nutrition values are less for 6 fl oz when prepared as directed.

Directions
Just add hot water or milk! Conventional Preparation: Place 2 tablespoons hot cocoa mix into mug. Add 6 fl oz hot water while stirring. Microwave Preparation: Heat 6 fl oz of water in microwave-safe mug for 1-1/2 minutes or until hot. Stir in 2 tablespoons hot cocoa mix. For richer cocoa, try adding milk instead of water.

description:
Every day, you should do something nice for yourself. Take a break. Relax. Recharge. Give in to a few delicious moments of me time. Café Escapes salutes this notion with a delectable collection of indulgent treats. They're rich, satisfying, and decadent - but not so much that you can't enjoy one every day. Whether you need an afternoon pick-me-up, or something to go with that hard-to-put-down book, Café Escapes® is the perfect companion. Prepare a cup just for you and enjoy a moment of uplifitng downtime.
One sip of our velvety rich milk chocolate cocoa and you'll know you're enjoying a higher order of hot cocoa. Unbelievably creamy, unquestionably satisfying-it's an ideal treat for moments of indulgent relaxation. Notes: This product contains milk. Caffeine content is estimated at less than 10 mg per serving (versus 100-150 mg in Arabica coffee). Contains a combination of natural and artificial sweeteners.
*Customers who have a Keurig® 2.0 brewer will need to select the HOT COCOA/OTHER button when brewing this product.
